result.title: Codeforces Serious Bug
result.content:
Hello community

I have experienced two bad happenings today on CF. I was surfing around the site and suddenly I came up in somebody else's account :O

First time I thought it is a little(!) bug and I ignored it but just now the same thing happened.

This in one of the screenshots I took. This time it was the account of Frez

I want to know if it has happen to anybody else or it's only me having this bad time ...

I am seriously worried about my account and I hope MikeMirzayanov will fix it soon.

Please share your same experience under this blog if it has also happened to you.

Thanks
